jobs.summary: I worked at Exxpress team, where I helped build the web dashboard. I was responsible for UI/UX and API requests, which involved to learn Elysia.js and Firebase, use Radix and develop a better user experience.
highlights: Using Shandcn to improve user experience and forms
Learning Elysia.js and Firebase to handle API requests
Understanding other developers' code structure and working in a team
